item.description: What’s with the Hyperlinks? Readability above all—following Matthew Butterick’s example in his Practical Typography web book. One should be able to read the text from start to finish with minimal distractions. Do you know what I find distracting? Horrible blue underlined text. This is design 101: if you want people to notice something, just make it look disgusting. Styling links in this way is common, but is mercifully becoming less common.
